content: this particular cowl pictured took two balls of yarn exactly it is 20 inches long and was 4 pattern repeats **important notice…** this is a free pattern and i m flattered that you want to make it and perhaps share it with your friends this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied reproduced distributed or altered in way without express permission do not reproduce this pattern to sell and/or sell any garment that you make using this pattern important notice…this is a free pattern this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied reproduced distributed or altered in way do not reproduce this pattern to sell and/or sell any garment that you make using this pattern anyone may use this pattern for charity there is no need to ask for permission
